drupalNodeEvent.title: Nursing In Greater China & The U.S. In 2020

field_speakers.processed: Dr. Tsu-yin Wu, Dr. Pamela Cipriano, Siew Lee Grand-Clement

field_organizers.processed: US Heartland China Association, Guardians of the Angeles Charitable Foundation, Eastern Michigan University,

field_description.processed: 2020 has been an especially challenging year for healthcare professionals as well as educators who have worked hand-in-hand across US and China in the past. In this discussion, we bring together practitioners, administrators, and others involved in the field of nursing to discuss experiences relevant to Chinese and American nurses, including the challenges of the COVID pandemic, as well as the future of U.S. â€“ China nursing collaboration.
